main.name: Arjun Singh
main.description: I am a certified full stack web developer with a degree in business marketing from Loyola University Maryland. I am looking to start my career and would eventualy like to work in the world of sports or esports marketing
main.bio: I am a recent college graduate who is looking to start his career in marketing.  After completing a online course and receiving a certification in web development, I have started to work with my dad and his business partner to design and create a website for their company. I just moved to Arizona where I spend most of my time watching movies, playing games, and hanging out with my family.
main.contactmessage: If you would like to get in contact, please reach out to me or fill out the form below.
